name: Stromae
description: '''Paul Van Haver''' ({{IPA|nl|ˈpʌul vɑn ˈɦaːvər}}; born 12 March 1985), better known by his stage name '''Stromae''' ({{IPA|fr|stʁɔmaj}}), is a Belgian singer, rapper, songwriter and record producer. He is best known for his music, which is a blend of [[Hip hop music|hip-hop]] and [[electronic music]] styles. Stromae came to wide public attention in 2009 with his song "[[Alors on danse]]" (from the album ''[[Cheese (album)|Cheese]]''), which became a [[Record chart|number one]] in several European countries. In 2013, his second album ''[[Racine carrée]]'' was a commercial success, selling two million copies in France and yielding chart-topping singles "[[Papaoutai]]" and "[[Formidable (song)|Formidable]]".
